name: Real Tennis Manager
description:
The most awesome tennis game of 2020, a Real tennis manager is also the most realistic tennis game available. Managing a player to climbs to the top 1 of the world in MTP/WTP pro tour like Murray, Djokovic, Federer, Kerber, Williams... Playing to beat another online player in thrilling Arena battles, Indeed, this is not a game, it is everything about Tennis. FEEL THE PASSION NOW!

Features:
* Live Arena ONLINE Multiplayer
* Real audience in the stadium with animation
* Able to increase stats(speed, goal or strong) to MAXIMUM
* Face 1000 top players of the world on Pro Tournaments with different and high starts
* Pro Tournaments, Arena mode
* 3 types of courts
* The most realistic tennis game is here
* Manage a player to win the game without controls
and efforts

Real tennis manager game is the best mobile tennis game ever! Enjoy thrilling gameplay, beautiful graphics and pack of action!

Real tennis manager 3D game offers fast and fluid control mode: swipe your fingers to hit or slice the ball. The game provides a huge range of unique players to choose from and allows you to steer your favorite players to succeed in the four Grand Slam tournaments. It feels like playing the real tennis game.

Real tennis manager 3D game also offers you a tweaked version of the familiar finger-swipe tennis gameplay combined with detailed elements that give you near to unlimited options for improving and customizing your character. To provide a more action-packed experience the tennis rules have been adjusted slightly, resulting in fast-paced gameplay and shorter but much more exciting matches!

On top of that, the game offers great graphics and visualizations to give you one of the most visually realistic tennis experiences to date.
